Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For!”
Reviews.Author: unckyherb
Reviews.Content: stayed gio nights 50 day trip stayed lots hotels staff indifferent dont rude didnt understand english answers questions short curt contact check check clean bathroom adequate nonsmoking adjoining apparently smoking beds uncomfortable free internet positives ten minute walk main train terminal low price elevator free internet clean neighborhood lots restaurants nearby negatives uncomfortable beds decided time sacrifice comfort location price luckily weather raining tough spend lot time looking sleep fit bill

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Castelfidardo, Rome”
Reviews.Author: rosemariemccaskie
Reviews.Content: plenty space comfy queen bed single travelling partner clean air conditioned hot looked recently refurbished tiny lift ideally situated near termini walkable tourist spots restaurants bars nearby street noisy

Reviews.Title: “Reception staff somewhat disorganised”
Reviews.Author: KazzarM
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel beginning time italy located close roma termini station travelling beyond rome fair walking distance tourist sights arrived time lead elses bag werent double near reception ok little noisy times beds hard found common throughout italy visit single quiet bathroom adequate

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, good location (in relation to Termini)”
Reviews.Author: Robbo_Traveller
Reviews.Content: liked hotel friendly staff clean didnt change towels stay otherwise cleaned reasonably bed air con bathroom shower bit weak breakfast included cafe block write home coffee croissant price value money overall fine experience

Reviews.Content: budgethotel backstreet wasn´t nice heading home late besides close central station restaurant supermarket ok bathroom found staff wasn´t english tryed help directions map hotel ok that´s

Reviews.Title: “location location location”
Reviews.Author: bryon_10
Reviews.Content: hotel aimed budget basic breakfastit five minuet walk rail stationand located third floor lift problemthe staff speak englishand friendly enoughthere showerbut reason free wi fi therethe cleanand surprised safe roomthere tvthe location greatin walked public walk lotbut plenty buses running rail station plenty eat supermarket street

Reviews.Title: “Great hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Greekkola
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights own couldnt happier stay exactly expected price paying comparable hotels ive stayed europe dealings desk staff day night pleasant courteous spoke english encouraging attempted bits italian hotel convenient walking transit sites rome fault hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased!”
Reviews.Author: JulesSunderland
Reviews.Content: pleased hotelwe arrived keys 2 road 5 hotel worried id read bad roadbut delight pleasantly surprised nice son block balcony front facing street bad workman front building scaffolding bit noisy morning didnt bother rises cleaned everyday standard ideal base seeing sights close termini station day leave bags day flight couldnt fault hotel

Reviews.Title: “value for money in italian capital”
Reviews.Author: rkpathk
Reviews.Content: hotel via 31 rome stayed days nights conveniently located near roma termini main railway station walk hotel famous street via century beautiful republica squire nearby walk hotel metro station buses destination rome avail tram services hotel road guide reception desk road lift accommodate couple luggage airy clean specious tv fridge modern bath towels changed day value money rome rate 85 euro night 10 discount cash payment morning breakfast coffee bun included street café thankful son daughter law milan chose hotel

Reviews.Title: “Disaster”
Reviews.Author: Chikira
Reviews.Content: booked double standard days rome arrived found owner bb lu andy lu bathroom cover bed dirty quilt blanket clean walls dirty staff wasnt helpful manage journey rome disaster

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel recently found nicerooms clean job didnt spend time roombeds everyday towels tv noisy people shouting hall hotel 3rd floor building lift stay cheap clean transport safety feb aand weather quiter tourist daily near dis termini station
